content:
# The furnace is still working, and it has successfully produced 1 copper plate while consuming more copper ore. It currently has 4 coal remaining as fuel and is actively processing the remaining copper ore.

# I will now check how many copper plates I can retrieve from the furnace and then collect them.
collect_item(Prototype.CopperPlate, furnace)  # Collect the produced copper plates from the furnace.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the updated inventory after collecting the copper plates.
